text.name: info1
text.text: Commander Genius aka Clone Keen Plus is a Commander Keen open source port to different platforms such as Linux, Windows, Mac OS and several handheld devices (GP2X, Wiz, Dingux, iPhone, Android). The project started as a continuation of CloneKeen.

text.name: info1
